Title: Infragistics Toolkit
Description: A collection of tools and libraries that can be used to add additional capabilities to Infragistics UI controls.
HomeWiki:
Overview

The IGToolkit project is a collection of tools and libraries that can be used to add additional capabilities to Infragistics UI controls.  The project contains enhancements for Infragistics WPF, Silverlight, ASP.NET and WinForms controls.  We welcome and encourage community contributions!

Whats in the Project?

The project code is ogranized by platform.  Below are descriptions of whats available for each platform.
